message:
Dear HR Team,

We would like to inform you that a new job applicant has been successfully registered in the system. Below are the applicant’s key details:

  • Name: {{ doc.applicant_name }}
  • Email: {{ doc.email_id }}
  • Phone: {{ doc.phone_number }}
  • Position Applied: {{ doc.designation }}
  • Company: {{ doc.custom_company }}
  • Department: {{ doc.custom_department }}
  • Current Role: {{ doc.custom_current_designation }}
  • Experience: {{ doc.custom_experience }} years
  • Available to Join In: {{ doc.custom_available_to_join_in_days }} days

Additional documents and detailed information are available in the Job Applicant record on the system.

Regards,
The Recruitment System
name: Screen Test Invitation
subject: Screen Test Invitation for Your Job Application at {{ doc.custom_company }}
